Interface HttpConnection<T>

    CloseableConnection<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

      • addRequestField

        <V> void addRequestField(HttpConnection.RequestField field,
                         V value)
        Add header to http request
        Parameters:
        field - Field that will be added in the headers of the request
        value - Value of the field, this will be serialized to string
        See Also:
        List of header fields and usage

      • addRequestFields

        void addRequestFields(java.util.Map<HttpConnection.RequestField,?> map)
        Add headers to http request
        Parameters:
        map - Map containing all fields and values, the values will be serialized to string
        See Also:
        List of header fields and usage

      • execute

        HttpResponse<T> execute()
                 throws FailedConnectionException
        Execute the HTTP request
        Returns:
        HttpResponse contains the response serialized and the status code
        Throws:
        FailedConnectionException - if api is not responding
